creator: sonnriver@gmail.com
text:
Content file htaccess : [code] ErrorDocument 404 /error.php [/code] content file error.php [code] Error Document not found. [/code] content file /etc/apache2/apache2.conf [code] ############### ## General ## ############### LockFile ${APACHE_LOCK_DIR}/accept.lock PidFile ${APACHE_PID_FILE} Timeout 300 KeepAlive On MaxKeepAliveRequests 100 KeepAliveTimeout 5 User ${APACHE_RUN_USER} Group ${APACHE_RUN_GROUP} DefaultType None HostnameLookups Off ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log LogLevel warn LogFormat "%v:%p %h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %O \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" vhost_combined LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %O \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" combined LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %O" common LogFormat "%{Referer}i -> %U" referer LogFormat "%{User-agent}i" agent ############### ## Mpm ## ############### StartServers 5 MinSpareServers 5 MaxSpareServers 10 MaxClients 150 MaxRequestsPerChild 0 StartServers 2 MinSpareThreads 25 MaxSpareThreads 75 ThreadLimit 64 ThreadsPerChild 25 MaxClients 150 MaxRequestsPerChild 0 StartServers 2 MinSpareThreads 25 MaxSpareThreads 75 ThreadLimit 64 ThreadsPerChild 25 MaxClients 150 MaxRequestsPerChild 0 ############### ## Include ## ############### Include mods-enabled/*.load Include mods-enabled/*.conf Include sites-enabled/ AccessFileName .htaccess Order allow,deny Deny from all Satisfy all Listen 80 Listen 443 NameVirtualHost *:80 NameVirtualHost *:433 ServerName localhost AllowOverride None Order Deny,Allow Deny from all Allow from 127.0.0.1 ServerTokens Prod ServerSignature Off TraceEnable Off [/code] requetes : https://site.tld/exist.php [status=ok, content flush] https://site.tld/dontexist.php [status=fail, redirection vers error.php] https://site.tld/dontexist.php%00 [status=fail and ignore directive errordocument] content is : [code] 404 Not Found

Not Found

The requested URL /a was not found on this server.

[/code] in place of the custom file.
